example[0]: The movie contains scenes of violence and bloodletting.
definition[1]: a medical treatment used in the past that involved removing some of a person’s blood
definition[2]: a reduction in the number of people working for an organization, industry etc
example[1]: Many jobs have been lost, and the bloodletting isn’t over yet.
example[2]: After two years of layoffs, bloodletting at the company may be over.
